array.string: Tobacco products (cigarettes, chewing tobacco, cigars, etc.)
Prescription stimulants (Ritalin, Concerta, Dexedrine, Adderall, diet pills, etc.) [Please report recreational use only.]
Inhalants (poppers, nitrous, glue, gas, paint thinner, etc.)
Sedatives or Sleeping Pills (Valium, Ativan, Xanax, Klonopin, Librium, Rohypnol, GHB, etc.) [Please report recreational use only.]
Hallucinogens (Ecstasy, LSD, acid, mushrooms, PCP, Special K, etc.)
Prescription opioids (morphine, codeine, fentanyl, oxycodone [OxyContin, Percocet], hydrocodone [Vicodin], methadone, buprenorphine [Suboxone], etc.) [Please report recreational use only.]
